thread.title: BRIEF-American Superconductor Reports Q3 Loss Per Share $0.21

title: BRIEF-American Superconductor Reports Q3 Loss Per Share $0.21
text:
February 5, 2018 / 10:43 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-American Superconductor Reports Q3 Loss Per Share $0.21 Reuters Staff 
Feb 5 (Reuters) - American Superconductor Corp: 
* AMSC REPORTS THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES BUSINESS OUTLOOK * Q3 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.18 * Q3 LOSS PER SHARE $0.21 * Q3 REVENUE $14.9 MILLION VERSUS $27.1 MILLION * SEES Q4 2017 LOSS PER SHARE LESS THAN $0.37‍ 
* FOR Q4 ENDING MARCH 31, 2018, AMSC EXPECTS THAT ITS REVENUES WILL BE IN RANGE OF $12.0 MILLION TO $18.0 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 806 749 1136)
